snippet.title: Perfect Balance Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam store: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1828770/Perfect_Balance/
Discord server: https://discord.gg/FUhjHSKFcX

Perfect Balance is a minimalist physics simulation game about balancing weights of different shapes and sizes on a tilting platform. Simple controls let you drag and drop weights wherever you choose, and upgrades will make the balancing easier.

This game was created during Ludum Dare #49: https://ldjam.com and is now ready to be released as a full game. Wishlist now and you'll be notified right when it releases, planning on January 2022.
